file_insights.description: Comprehensive test suite for QA readiness check components
Main component for managing QA readiness workflow
Component to block or allow QA based on readiness status
Component to display detailed readiness check results

patterns_discovered: React Testing Library for component testing
React Query for data fetching and management
Comprehensive error and loading state handling
Detailed type definitions for readiness checks
gotchas_discovered: Complexity of simulating different readiness states
Need for extensive mocking of API calls
Handling asynchronous state changes in tests
Managing multiple fetch scenarios (initial load, run check, refetch)
recommendations: Consider adding more edge case tests
Implement error boundary for unexpected failures
Create more granular type definitions for check results
Add performance monitoring for API calls
Implement retry mechanism for failed checks
